metadata.raw:
Type 1107 Destroyer (Military Starship)

The Type 1107 Destroyer is in service with the Imperial Glisten Navy. While designed prior to the outbreak of the war, interruption of the ship building program during the brief Collace occupation of Glisten prevented any from being completed until after the fighting was over.

CraftID: Type 1107 Destroyer, TL15, MCr 13,709
Hull: 9000/22500, Disp=10000, Config=1SL, Armor=70G, Unloaded=271,396t, Loaded=289,823t
Power: 327/654, Fusion=88200MW, Dur=30 days
Loco: 360/720, Jump 3, 990/1980, Maneuver=4, Agility=0
Comm: Radio=System, LaserComm=System, MaserComm=System
Sensors: EMM EMS Active(Far Orbit), EMS Jammer(Far Orbit), EMS Passive(Interstellar), High Pen Densitometer(1km), Neutrino Sensor(10kw), ActObjScan=Rout, ActObjPin=Rout, PassObjScan=Rout, PassObjPin=Rout, PassEnScan=Simp, PassEnPin=Rout

     Bearing    1                2            3              1

          Bearing      2
